markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Suli-Jann](/Feats.aspx?ID=2583) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
<trait label="Suli" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=310" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 110 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your elemental ancestor was a [janni](/Monsters.aspx?ID=211), genies that walk the mortal world and embody all four elements together. You inherited a janni's nature as a wanderer and ability to survive in many types of environment, from the hottest desert to the coldest tundra. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16). If you would automatically become trained in Survival (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You gain the [Forager](/Feats.aspx?ID=786) skill feat as a bonus feat.
name: Suli-Jann
